title: Grilled Peanut Butter Nutella and Banana Sandwich
summary: Grilled Peanut Butter Nutellan and Banana Sandwich might be just the main course you are searching for. For 85 cents per serving, this recipe covers 20% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. Watching your figure? This vegetarian recipe has 628 calories, 17g of protein, and 33g of fat per serving. Many people made this recipe, and 1003 would say it hit the spot. The Fourth Of July will be even more special with this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 7 minutes. A mixture of butter, nutella spread, creamy peanut butter, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so delicious. To use up the banana you could follow this main course with the Chocolate Dipped Banana Cupcakes with Banana Buttercream as a dessert. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 81%. This score is spectacular. Try Grilled Peanut Butter and Banana Split Sandwich, Grilled Peanut Butter, Chocolate & Banana Sandwich, and Puffy Banana Peanut Butter Cup Sweet Grilled Sandwich for similar recipes.
instructions: Heat a skillet to medium heat.Spread one side of the bread with peanut butter, and the other with Nutella. Add slices of banana and close the sandwich.Butter one side of the bread and place on the heated skillet. Spread a layer of butter on the other side while the sandwich is cooking.Cook until lightly golden and flip to the other side. Cook again until golden and remove from heat.Let cool for a moment so as to not burn your mouth, and then enjoy!

steps.step: Heat a skillet to medium heat.
Spread one side of the bread with peanut butter, and the other with Nutella.
Add slices of banana and close the sandwich.Butter one side of the bread and place on the heated skillet.
Spread a layer of butter on the other side while the sandwich is cooking.Cook until lightly golden and flip to the other side. Cook again until golden and remove from heat.
Let cool for a moment so as to not burn your mouth, and then enjoy!
